本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: Maitreya Service [p888]. The Maitreya Service (Mirokue), also called Propogation of the Doctrines Service (denbōe), was held at the Golden Hall, where the principal object of worship was a sixteen-foot statue of Maitreya (Miroku)(p510n). [伝法会]
